taking_quiz.title: Taking a Miniquiz
taking_quiz.objective: Log into 508physics and take a miniquiz.

studying_quiz.title: Studying for a Quiz
studying_quiz.objective: Recognize the difference between the study page and the miniquiz page; study for a miniquiz before taking it.

retaking_quiz.title: Retaking a Quiz
retaking_quiz.objective: Retake a physics quiz after taking it the first time to improve your score

structure.title: Curriculum Structure
structure.objective: Us the terms Topic Cluster, Topic, and Pod to understand how the curriculum fits together
